TopicTitle: Resscue Mission, Orbiter fixed in its orbit not moving.

Articles.Content:
Title says it all, tried to rendezvous with orbiter, it suddenly stopped in its orbit and I went shooting by it at 2300 m/s.

I escaped and went to tracking center and reloaded and it worked fine.
Does it have a grabbing claw (or a similar part from a mod) attached to it?
